title: Ep. 506 - The Establishment Always Wins
description:
After paying more than $12 million per delegate, Mike Bloomberg drops out of the presidential race and endorses Joe Biden. Meanwhile, Bernie Sanders releases a new ad starring former president Barack Obama. We will examine why the establishment always wins. Then, at a pro-abortion rally, Rashida Tlaib shrieks, and Chuck Schumer threatens two Supreme Courts justices. We will examine why pro-abortion activists always seem so crazy. Finally, Alex Trebek gives us all some much-needed perspective, and finally the Mailbag!

Check out The Cold War: What We Saw, a new podcast written and presented by Bill Whittle at https://www.dailywire.com/coldwar. In Part 1 we peel back the layers of mystery cloaking the Terror state run by the Kremlin, and watch as America takes its first small steps onto the stage of world leadership.

If you like The Michael Knowles Show, become a member TODAY with promo code: KNOWLES and enjoy the exclusive benefits for 10% off at https://www.dailywire.com/Knowles
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
